author: Shannon Connellan
title: Smart goats, seizing the moment, take over town under coronavirus lockdown
description: Taking advantage of a global pandemic for your own gain is a jerk move. Can someone tell these goats? With the UK currently under government lockdown to quell the spread of the coronavirus, places like Llandudno, a coastal town in north Wales, have become rat…
content:
